---
title: "Comparison of TTR between volumes"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library("tidyverse")
```


```{r}
df <- read.csv("volume_comparison_100_datapoints_per_volume.txt", header = TRUE, sep = ",")
summary(df)
```

```{r}
df %>%
  filter(Language == "kum-folklore") -> df1
df1
```
```{r}
aov_res <- aov(TTR ~ Volume, data = df1)
summary(aov_res)
```

```{r}
library("ggpubr")
```

```{r}
df  %>%
  ggplot(aes(Volume, TTR, color = Volume))+
  geom_boxplot(outlier.shape = NA)+
  geom_jitter(width = 0.1)+
  labs(x = "Volume",
       y = "TTR")+
  theme_bw()+
  theme(legend.position = "none")+
  facet_grid(cols = vars(Language))
```
